Articles.Content:
Ever since the release of KSP 1.2 I haven't been able to get MechJeb to function.  I've deleted it from GameData several time and reinstalled various versions but it just doesn't work.  Any suggestions would be appreciated as I am too old and tired to do the orbital mechanics by hand.

I might also mention that the problem is on a mac pro running the latest OS X.

Joseph
If you'll check the MJ thread, he has a dev build up already that's been working for me.
I can confirm that the dev version of MJ2 works with my 1.2(I also have outer planets mod,for version 1.1.3)
Thank you all so much!  I'll check out the thread right now.  Again, thanks for the help.
